name: Maitetsu
description: Humanoid modules that control all aspects of the railway cars called “Raillords” exist in this world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft™ Windows® Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.3GHz and above Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft™ Windows® 10 Processor: 1.3GHz and above Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard sound
